mapper.select: SELECT id , place_name , xlab , ylab , place_address , start_date , end_date , day_count , place_load_address , plan_hp , plan_title FROM user_plan WHERE id = #{id} AND plan_title = #{title} AND delete_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY day_count
SELECT place_name, count(place_name) as count FROM user_plan where delete_yn = 'Y' group by place_name order by count(place_name) DESC
